languages.text: "Хватит с меня твоего блеяния, старуха! Я еще прошлый раз сказал, что меня твой говор из себя выводит, аж язык вырезать хочется. Ни у одного проповедника Чорды не хватит терпения выслушивать твою брехню про звезды, богов, духов и прочую чушь".

traits.locale_text: "Хватит с меня твоего блеяния, старуха! Я еще прошлый раз сказал, что меня твой говор из себя выводит, аж язык вырезать хочется. Ни у одного проповедника Чорды не хватит терпения выслушивать твою брехню про звезды, богов, духов и прочую чушь".

languages.text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."
languages.original_text: "Хватит с меня твоего блеяния, старуха! Я еще прошлый раз сказал, что меня твой говор из себя выводит, аж язык вырезать хочется. Ни у одного проповедника Чорды не хватит терпения выслушивать твою брехню про звезды, богов, духов и прочую чушь".

traits.locale_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you that your dialect ticks me off so much, it makes me want to cut your tongue off. Not a single Chorda preacher would have the patience to hear you blather about the stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

"Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you that your dialect ticks me off so much, it makes me want to cut your tongue off. Not a single Chorda preacher would have the patience to hear you blather about the stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

"Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you that your dialect ticks me off so much, it makes me want to cut your tongue off. Not a single Chorda preacher would have the patience to hear you blather about the stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

"Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you that your dialect ticks me off so much, it makes me want to cut your tongue off. Not a single Chorda preacher would have the patience to hear you blather about the stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

"Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

"Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

languages.text: «¡Basta de gimoteos, vieja arpía! Ya te he dicho que vuestro habla me irrita tanto que me dan ganas de cortarte la lengua. Ni un los predicadores de Chorda tendrían la paciencia de oíros desvariar sobre estrellas, dioses, espíritus y demás pamplinas».
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta de gimoteos, vieja arpía! Ya te he dicho que vuestro dialecto me irrita tanto que me dan ganas de cortarte la lengua. Ni un solo predicador Chorda tendría la paciencia de oíros desvariar sobre estrellas, dioses, espíritus y demás pamplinas».

languages.text: “别再絮絮叨叨了，老妖婆！我已经警告过你，你的话把我烦透了，烦得我都想把你舌头割下来。就算换成了库尔达的布道士，他们恐怕不会有耐心听你絮叨什么星星、神明、精魂之类的屁话。”
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

traits.locale_text: “别再絮絮叨叨了，老妖婆！我已经警告过你，你的方言太烦人了，烦得我都想把你舌头割下来。要是换成了库尔达的布道士，他们恐怕不会有耐心听你絮叨什么星星、神明、精魂之类的屁话。”

languages.text: « Tais-toi, vieille folle ! Je t'ai déjà dit que ton patois me porte tellement sur les nerfs que j'ai envie de te trancher la langue. Même un prêcheur des Chorda n'aurait pas la patience de t'entendre déblatérer sur les étoiles, les dieux, les esprits et toutes ces sornettes. »
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

traits.locale_text: « Tais-toi, vieille folle ! Je t'ai déjà dit que ton patois pouilleux me porte tellement sur les nerfs que j'ai envie de te trancher la langue. Même un prêcheur des Chorda n'aurait pas la patience de t'entendre déblatérer sur les étoiles, les dieux, les esprits et toutes ces sornettes. »

languages.text: 「いい加減にしろ、この老いぼれが！言っただろ？お前の喋り方は舌を切り落としてやりたくなるほど苛立つと。星だの、神だの、精霊だの、そんなくだらない話を聞かされるのは、チョーダのプリーチャーでも耐えきれないだろうさ」
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

traits.locale_text: 「いい加減にしろ、この老いぼれが！言っただろ？お前の喋り方は舌を切り落としてやりたくなるほど苛立つと。星だの、神だの、精霊だの、そんなくだらない話を聞かされるのは、チョーダのプリーチャーでも耐えきれないだろうさ」

languages.text: "Genug von Eurem Geblöke, alte Hexe! Ich habe Euch schon gesagt, dass Euer Dialekt mich wütend macht. So wütend, dass ich Euch die Zunge herausschneiden möchte. Nicht einmal ein Chorda-Prediger hätte die Geduld, Euch von den Sternen, Göttern, Geistern und anderem Unfug faseln zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."

traits.locale_text: "Genug von Eurem Geblöke, alte Hexe! Ich habe Euch schon gesagt, dass Euer Dialekt mich derart wütend macht, dass ich Euch die Zunge herausschneiden möchte. Kein einziger Chorda-Prediger hätte die Geduld, Euch von den Sternen, Göttern, Geistern und anderem Unfug faseln zu hören."

languages.text: "Bu kadar gevezelik yeter kocakarı. Konuşmanın beni rahatsız ettiğini sana söylemiştim. Konuştuğunda dilini koparasım geliyor. Bir Chorda vaizinin bile yıldızların, tanrıların, ruhların ve tüm saçmalıkların hakkında atıp tutmanı dinlemeye yetecek sabrı yoktur."
languages.original_text: "Enough of your bleating, old hag! I already told you your speech offends me so — it makes me want to cut out your tongue. Not even a Chorda preacher would have the patience to listen to you blather on about your stars, gods, spirits, and other nonsense."
